name: Cube Road (Kyle Nyland)
description:
Cube Road is a 2D puzzle-platformer game based on the Famicase 2019 cartridge of the same name. Get to the Goal Cube to complete each level! Can you complete them all?

Developer: Kyle Nyland | Twitter

Music: dreamreader | Twitter

Famicase: CUBE ROAD by Hangedman | Twitter

Controls
  • Left & Right arrow keys - Move left & right / choose level
  • Up arrow key - Jump
  • Z key - Pick up / put down cube
  • Enter key - Confirm choice / Go to next level
  • Escape key - Go back to title screen / quit game
  • R key (hold) - Reset the current level
  • F key - Toggle fullscreen mode
